bibl.title: Gaza Jars not Baggy Amphorae.
bibl.note: Has some general remarks on the raw material of ostraka from Egypt and corrects a recently published misidentification of such sherds in Cambridge [ed.: John C. SHELTON, More Ostraca from the Fitzwilliam Museum, ZPE 86 (1991) pp. 275-276, Nos 12-13 et pl. XXI; David W.J. GILL, Nachwort. An Archaeological Note on Two Ostraca from the Fitzwilliam Collec tion, ibidem, p. 277].
bibl.seg: 145.4 O. Cambr. Fitzw. Mus. Inv. GR. P.530; GR. P.532
BAILEY Donald M., Gaza Jars not Baggy Amphorae.

Has some general remarks on the raw material of ostraka from Egypt and corrects a recently published misidentification of such sherds in Cambridge [ed.: John C. SHELTON, More Ostraca from the Fitzwilliam Museum, ZPE 86 (1991) pp. 275-276, Nos 12-13 et pl. XXI; David W.J. GILL, Nachwort. An Archaeological Note on Two Ostraca from the Fitzwilliam Collec tion, ibidem, p. 277].
